job_details.degree_required: BS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or any related discipline

jd: From: Cloud Ingest, Cloud Ingest tahajuddin@cloudingest.com Reply to: tahajuddin@cloudingest.com Job Title: .NET DeveloperLocation: Plano, TX (On-site)Visa: H4EAD & USC onlyNo H1B & GC PleaseResponsibility:4+ years of industry experience with focus on web-based .NET software application development within an Agile delivery framework.Experience in Object Oriented Programming.Knowledge in Microsoft SQL Server Design, Query and tuning.Experience in C#.Experience in NodeJSExperience in TypescriptKnowledge of application architectural design patterns such as MVC.Experience in Angular 2+.Experience with DevOps CI/CD tools like Jenkins and Ansible.Knowledge of repositories such as GitHub, Bitbucket, NPM, etc. for source code and dependency management.Able to work individually or well with a team and take End-to-End ownership of tasksShould be a continuous learner with problem-solving mindsetSolid analytical, innovative, independent thinker and problem solver.Must be able to handle multiple tasks and adapt to a constantly changing environmentAttention to the detail.Takes pride and ownership in their work.Be passionate about quality, programming, and software development in general.Solid knowledge of application architecture.Ability to coordinate with multiple application partners, business, other IT managers, architecture, internal stakeholders and developers in providing solution suggestions and constructive feedback.Software development using Agile methodology.SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS)Entity FrameworkObject Relational Mapping (ORM) experienceExperience with OpenShiftAbility to identify and raise potential risks to the team.Ability to translate business requirements into actionable tasks.Comfortable when talking in front of a group or leading a discussion.Knowledge of risk (credit, operational and market).Experience with Unix and Shell ScriptingBS/MS in Computer Science, Engineering, or any related discipline
